slice_history.goal: Apply Post-Delivery Feedback Loop edits to all packs
slice_history.notes: Feedback loop (ISSUES REPORTED / APPROVED / STOP) applied to all orchestrator files, slice-plan skills, and standalone commands across all 5 packs.

slice_history.goal: Verify all packs are consistent and commands match across packs
slice_history.notes: Audit confirmed all 5 packs have identical 17 commands and 8 procedure skills. Added F11 (OpenCode), F12 (Design Command) to requirements.json. Updated all counts from 4→5 packs, 16→17 commands.

slice_history.notes: Created bridge-advisor in all 5 packs (F13). 3 advisor roles: Product Strategist, Developer Advocate, Critical Friend. Updated command listings in AGENTS.md (codex, opencode) and setup.sh. All counts updated 17→18 commands.

slice_history.goal: Rebuild all 5 tar.gz files using package.sh
slice_history.notes: Rebuilt all tar.gz files: bridge-full (22K), bridge-standalone (22K), bridge-claude-code (23K), bridge-codex (23K), bridge-opencode (23K). All archives validated.

slice_history.goal: Fix RooCode Ask-mode return path so orchestrator resumes active slice automatically
slice_history.notes: Initial attempt added CLARIFICATIONS HANDLED VIA ASK rules (post-hoc). Replaced in S06 with preventive approach: ban Ask mode switching entirely, use HUMAN: blocks for clarifications instead.

slice_history.goal: Replace ineffective Ask-mode return rules with preventive no-Ask-mode constraint
slice_history.notes: Removed CLARIFICATIONS HANDLED VIA ASK sections from bridge-full orchestrator policy and standalone bridge-start/bridge-resume commands. Added hard constraint: NEVER switch to Ask mode — use HUMAN: blocks for user input, delegate to sub-tasks for code investigation. Root cause: S05 fix was post-hoc (told AI to recover after switching) instead of preventive (tell AI not to switch). Tar.gz rebuild needed.

slice_history.goal: Align bridge-codex with latest Codex conventions and fix Codex-pack inconsistencies
slice_history.notes: Researched latest Codex docs/changelog. Added native `.codex/skills/` tree (26 skills) as compatibility target, kept `.agents/skills/` as authoring mirror, standardized command references to `$bridge-*`, aligned status vocabulary to planned/in-progress/review/done/blocked, fixed eval filename expectation and context path typo, and added `quality_gates.e2e_critical_paths` to codex requirements template. Updated codex config with optional `profiles.bridge` (gpt-5-codex + reasoning summary auto + web search).

handoff.stopped_at: S07 complete — bridge-codex aligned to latest Codex skills/config patterns and internal command/status consistency fixed
handoff.next_immediate: Rebuild tar.gz files with package.sh, then validate bridge-codex in a fresh Codex project (skill discovery, $bridge invocation, profile usage)
watch_out: bridge-codex now includes both `.agents/skills` (authoring mirror) and `.codex/skills` (native runtime); keep them synchronized on future edits

commands_to_run.verify_feedback_loop: grep -rl 'ISSUES REPORTED' bridge-full/ bridge-standalone/ bridge-claude-code/ bridge-codex/ bridge-opencode/ | sort
